titleStmt.title: A Settlement of the mines, late of Sir Carbery Pryse whereby the old lease thereof is renewed and a better constitution established in order to raise a stock of twenty thousand pounds for the effectual carrying on the said mineral works.
titleStmt.author: Mackworth, Humphrey, Sir, 1657-1727.

notesStmt.note: Legal settlement between Sir Humphrey Mackworth and partners in the mines formerly owned by Sir Carbery Pryse.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
